org.ietf.nea.pt.socket

Class SocketTransportConnectionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.socket.SocketTransportConnectionBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransportConnectionBuilder<Socket>

    public class SocketTransportConnectionBuilder
extends Object
implements TransportConnectionBuilder<Socket>
    Builder to create a TransportConnection based on an underlying socket.

    • Field Summary

                                TransportWriter<TransportMessage> writer,
                                TransportReader<TransportMessageContainer> reader)
        Creates a builder for a TransportConnection objekt using the specified reader and writer for serialization.
        Parameters:
        tProtocol - the transport protocol identifier
        writer - the transport protocol serializer
        reader - the transport protocol parser

        selfInitiated - the parameter, which identifies, if the connection was initiated by this side
